meta.notes: Gold target plans for Study C continuity score. Plans are derived deterministically from OpenR1-Psy counselor_think using Study C metadata.source_openr1_ids.

c_001.plan: explore the connection between thoughts and emotions; monitor emotions and triggers

c_002.plan: start with empathy, validate their feelings, gently suggest exploring the sensitivity, and reinforce their ability to navigate this

c_003.plan: ways to build resilience against criticism, like surrounding themselves with supportive people

c_004.plan: reflecting on interactions and feelings (pre/during/post); identify negative thought patterns in family interactions; strategies for being with family

c_006.plan: focus on self-actualization and personal growth

c_007.plan: exploring thoughts and behaviors using a cognitive-behavioral approach

c_008.plan: journaling to identify thought and behavior patterns

c_009.plan: discuss thought patterns around sleep and assess support system

c_010.plan: address thought patterns and behavioral changes; explore underlying triggers and moods
